job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a forward-thinking developer eager to harness the power of GenAI to redefine business standards and enhance productivity? Are you bored of solving the same customer support tickets or resolving the same bugs over and over again?, * Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs. This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets. One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
     * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
     * Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction., * Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_details.full_text:
AI Software Engineer, IgniteTech (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Are you a forward-thinking developer eager to harness the power of GenAI to redefine business standards and enhance productivity? Are you bored of solving the same customer support tickets or resolving the same bugs over and over again?, * Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs. This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets. One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
     * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
     * Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction., * Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, fine-tuning, and deployment of applications built on large language models (LLMs) and generative AI technologies. Key responsibilities include creating autonomous support platforms using LLMs, integrating state-of-the-art AI like GPT-4 Vision, and enhancing AI solutions across infrastructures like AWS. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building user-facing systems and leveraging generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs' directly involves the creation and adaptation of models (LLMs) for a specific task.
job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets' points to the software development lifecycle for applications.
job_tasks.phrase: development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision' involves working with and evaluating advanced AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows' indicates understanding business needs and enabling others to use technology effectively.
job_tasks.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues' points to operational aspects of AI solutions, including performance, integration, and support in production environments.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality' highlights the alignment of technical work with business goals and service quality.
job_tasks.phrase: Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
